fields.summary: The name of API set, which is registered through engine's platform method registration API. This property is only applicable for class type itself.
The name of member of the API set this member would bridge to. This property is only applicable for class members.

name: Bridged
summary:
A class marked by this attribute is bridged to platform class/methods through registration.

This approach allows an optimized performance at the price of complexity. As of current version, this attribute is reserved for system use only.
